title: Spiritual Diet
author: Alyssa Malehorn
description: Explore the best-selling and newly released spiritual diet on Audible. New to Audible? Try Audible free.
cleaned_text: Spiritual Diet - - The Third Eye Diet - Intuition Nutrition for Spiritual Activation - By: Alyssa Malehorn - Narrated by: Alyssa Malehorn - Length: 6 hrs and 47 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story When you're on a path of spiritual and intuitive awakening, you will at some point run into blockages that hijack your progress. These can be programs, habits, conditioning, or patterns you've picked up that sabotage your efforts to meditate, become more centered, or activate your intuition. You want your physical world to elevate your spiritual world, not drag it down. But is that even possible? It is. - - This book is an offering of love and wisdom! Highly recommend - By Hannah on 06-03-21 - [The Third Eye Diet](/pd/The-Third-Eye-Diet-Audiobook/B096J37G1X?ref=a_topic_aud_c2_lProduct_1_1&pf_rd_p=e1a087a6-c077-456d-9e18-1d9e4e79d7b9&pf_rd_r=SKSJSB06954BREWWQ2SD&pageLoadId=wrtzam3FsCdinndC&creativeId=755b9948-eaa6-4ecb-b8b6-a097303f0fe4) - Intuition Nutrition for Spiritual Activation - Narrated by: [Alyssa Malehorn](/search?searchNarrator=Alyssa+Malehorn&ref=a_topic_aud_c2_lNarrator_1_1_1&pf_rd_p=e1a087a6-c077-456d-9e18-1d9e4e79d7b9&pf_rd_r=SKSJSB06954BREWWQ2SD&pageLoadId=wrtzam3FsCdinndC&creativeId=755b9948-eaa6-4ecb-b8b6-a097303f0fe4) - Length: 6 hrs and 47 mins - Release date: 06-03-21 - Language: English - - When you're on a path of spiritual and intuitive awakening, you will at some point run into blockages that hijack your progress.... Add to Cart failed.Please try again later Add to Wish List failed.Please try again later Remove from wishlist failed.Please try again later Adding to library failedPlease try again Follow podcast failedPlease try again Unfollow podcast failedPlease try $19.59 or 1 credit Sale price: $19.59 or 1 credit - - - Kriya Yoga for Beginners - The Ultimate Guide to Yoga Asanas, Mudras, Meditation, Pranayama, Kundalini Awakening, and Samadhi (Spiritual Yoga) - By: Mari Silva - Narrated by: Eric Burr - Length: 4 hrs and 11 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Kriya Yoga is an ancient system of meditation and yoga techniques that was first brought to the West in the late 1800s by Paramahansa Yogananda, a spiritual teacher from India. Kriya Yoga is often referred to as the "yoga of action" or "the path of karma yoga" because it is based on the principle that spiritual growth can only be achieved through selfless service and action. This easy-to-follow guide will teach you everything you need to know about Kriya Yoga, from the basic principles and history to the different techniques you can use to get the most out of this powerful spiritual tool. - [Kriya Yoga for Beginners](/pd/Kriya-Yoga-for-Beginners-Audiobook/B0CFW1NGWB?ref=a_topic_aud_c2_lProduct_1_12&pf_rd_p=e1a087a6-c077-456d-9e18-1d9e4e79d7b9&pf_rd_r=SKSJSB06954BREWWQ2SD&pageLoadId=wrtzam3FsCdinndC&creativeId=755b9948-eaa6-4ecb-b8b6-a097303f0fe4) - The Ultimate Guide to Yoga Asanas, Mudras, Meditation, Pranayama, Kundalini Awakening, and - Series: [Spiritual Yoga](/series/Spiritual-Yoga-Audiobook/B0CFY2M625?ref=a_topic_aud_c2_lSeries_1_12_1&pf_rd_p=e1a087a6-c077-456d-9e18-1d9e4e79d7b9&pf_rd_r=SKSJSB06954BREWWQ2SD&pageLoadId=wrtzam3FsCdinndC&creativeId=755b9948-eaa6-4ecb-b8b6-a097303f0fe4), Book 5 and 11 mins - Release date: 08-16-23 - Language: English - - This easy-to-follow guide will teach you everything you need to know about Kriya Yoga, from the basic principles and history of the practice to the different techniques you can use to get the most out of this powerful spiritual tool....
